name: Tiny Walls
description:
This is my submission for MiniJam 82: Doodle. The game is about a room that is shrinking and the player must collect items to stop it from shrinking and killing the player. 

In order to fit the 'Doodle' Theme i gave myself the challenge of creating all the art assets within a short 10 mins 'Doodle' session.

Credits:

Background Music - Videogame 2 (https://www.dl-sounds.com/royalty-free/videogame2/)

Sound Effect - "Bounce" (https://freesound.org/people/JustInvoke/sounds/446100/)
